CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode, "CAD"), ( Commissionable_GP__c * Exchange_Rate__c ), Commissionable_GP__c )
/*
IF( ( ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode, "CAD") && !ISBLANK(Exchange_Rate__c) ) , ( Commissionable_GP__c * Exchange_Rate__c ), Commissionable_GP__c )
$Label.ExchangeRateCADtoUSD
*/
CustomField.label: Converted Gross Profit (USD)
